script.caption: Radke standing in the echoing, dimly lit hallway of the university, an eerie chill in the air.

dialogue.text: This quiet makes the university feel ancient. An omen of the haunting ghost, perhaps?

script.caption: A detailed close-up of a centuries-old piece of paper discovered in the dean's office, cryptic symbols on it.

dialogue.text: It could be a clue about our phantom visitor.

script.caption: A spectral entity floating through the physics lecture hall, old-fashioned academic robes billowing around it.

dialogue.text: Seek the truth.... Solve the mystery... Set me free...
We must decipher the message. The symbol on the document, it might lead us somewhere.

script.caption: Radke standing together in the university's ancient underground vaults, tension in the air as they confront the ghost.

dialogue.text: We have your message. We seek the truth.
The answer lies... in the past...
